thread.title: Peter from Cruise Planners
thread.title_full: Ski.com reviewed by Peter from Cruise Planners

author: Peter from Cruise Planners
title: Peter from Cruise Planners
text: This is the first time I book a ski trip with skidotcom. I must of called a dozen times getting Quote: s and felt bad I wasn't able to close the deals. Finally, I was able to help one of my clients find what they wanted and Skidotcom helped like a champ. Hope to repeat!
